body: Ive been depressed lately and my map didnt work out well and I traveled to spend my vacation in a place with very slow internet so I'm gonna disappear for 2 - 3 months to whenever I feel like coming back, now Im not popular, a mod, a donor but I just liked to inform those who care :)
